casebody.data:
Roy Ronald HENSLEY, Employee, Plaintiff
v.
INDUSTRIAL MAINTENANCE OVERFLOW, Employer and
PMA Insurance Group, Carrier, Defendants. No. 514P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2005. Neil P. Andrews, Nadia Z. Schroth, Charlotte, for Industrial Maintenance, et al. David Gantt, Asheville, for Hensley.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 6th day of October 2004 by Defendants in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th day of May 2005."
